definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.chinese: 他們穿四輪旱冰鞋在街上滑行。

sentences.english: I am as awkward as a cow on skates.
sentences.chinese: 我笨得像一頭穿着溜冰鞋的牛。

sentences.english: Sue: Would you like to borrow my skates?
Whenever I wear skate shoes, slip on the road happy, the heart particularly happy.
sentences.chinese: 每當我穿着滑冰鞋在路上快活的滑時，心裏特別高興。

sentences.english: She roller skated across rather unsteadily.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着旱冰鞋晃晃悠悠地滑了過去。

sentences.english: In international pattern match, double row wheel roller skates are specified with his shoe.
sentences.chinese: 在國際花樣比賽上，雙排輪旱冰鞋是指定用鞋。

sentences.english: Harold: I'll get you skates, see you there.
sentences.chinese: 我去幫你買冰鞋，一會見。

sentences.english: You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場你能夠租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: Athletes use double row wheel roller skates can finish all kinds of tricks.
sentences.chinese: 運動員使用雙排輪旱冰鞋可以完成各種花樣動作。

sentences.english: We wear shoes when we skate.
sentences.chinese: 當我們滑冰時，我們穿着溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: What are you doing in the living room with your roller skates on?
sentences.chinese: 你穿着旱冰鞋在起居室幹什麼？

sentences.english: My skates hang sadly in the wardrobe .
sentences.chinese: 我的溜冰鞋悲慼地掛在衣櫥裏。

sentences.english: First you should step by step build up your confidence with the ice skates on.
sentences.chinese: 首先你要逐漸建立起穿上溜冰鞋的信心。

sentences.english: He showed his friends, and for his birthday he got pads and new roller blades!
sentences.chinese: 過生日時，他又得到了一副護膝和一雙新旱冰鞋。

definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
